mapper.select: select a.seq, a.rcStatus, a.rcRegDateTime, a.rcModDateTime, a.rcDelNy, a.factory_seq, a.grocery_seq from Receiving as a where 1=1 ORDER BY a.seq desc
SELECT seq, rcStatus, rcDelNy, factory_seq, grocery_seq FROM Receiving WHERE 1=1 AND seq = #{seq} ORDER BY seq DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO receiving ( seq, rcStatus, rcRegDateTime, rcDelNy, factory_seq, grocery_seq ) values ( #{seq}, #{rcStatus}, now(), #{rcDelNy}, #{factory_seq}, #{grocery_seq} )
mapper.update: UPDATE receiving SET rcStatus = #{rcStatus}, rcModDateTime = now(), rcDelNy = #{rcDelNy}, factory_seq = #{factory_seq}, grocery_seq = #{grocery_seq} WHERE seq = #{seq}
